appSubtitle: Sanin ainihin saurin intanet na yankinku
resultsSubtitle: Ga kallon aikin intanet ɗinku na yanzu.
shareSummary: Na gwada saurin intanet dina da myareaspeed! Saukewa: {speed} Mbps, Ping: {ping} ms, Jitter: {jitter} ms. Gwada saurin ka!
aboutText1: myareaspeed aikace-aikacen gwajin saurin intanet ne da aka tsara don ba da bayanai na musamman na yanki da ra'ayoyin al'umma, wanda aka kera don masu amfani a Najeriya da Afirka.
aboutText2: Mun yi imanin cewa kowa ya cancanci samun cikakken bayani game da aikin intanet ɗinsa, ba kawai a matsayin lamba ba, amma a cikin mahallin wurinsa da bukatunsa.
aboutText3: Kobowallet Innovation ne ya kirkiro wannan aikin, kamfanin fasaha da ke da niyyar samar da mafita masu amfani ga kalubalen yau da kullum.
aboutMissionText: Manufarmu ita ce karfafa masu amfani da intanet da bayanai masu gaskiya da kuma dandamali don raba kwarewarsu. Ta hanyar tattara bayanan aiki, muna da niyyar ƙirƙirar cikakken taswirar ingancin intanet, don taimaka wa masu amfani su yanke shawara mai kyau game da masu ba da sabis.
privacyIntro: Sirrinka yana da mahimmanci a gare mu. Wannan manufar tana bayanin irin bayanan da muke tattarawa da yadda muke amfani da su.
privacyDataText1: Lokacin da ka gudanar da gwajin sauri, muna tattara waɗannan bayanan ba tare da suna ba:
privacyDataPoint1: Sakamakon gwajin sauri (saurin intanet, ping, jitter).
privacyDataPoint2: Adireshin IP ɗinka, wanda muke amfani da shi don sanin ISP da wurinka (birni/ƙasa). Ba ma adana cikakken adireshin IP ɗinka.
privacyDataPoint3: Duk wani ra'ayi da ka bayar da son rai, kamar wuri, kima, da sharhi. Dukkan ra'ayoyin ana miƙa su ba tare da suna ba.
privacyUsageText: Ana haɗa bayanan da ba a san sunansu ba da muke tattarawa kuma ana amfani da su don kunna Cibiyar Al'ummarmu, tana nuna kididdiga da bayanai na musamman na yanki. Yana taimaka wa kowa ya fahimci aikin ainihi na ISP daban-daban a wurare daban-daban.
contactIntro: Za mu so mu ji daga gare ku. Ko kuna da tambaya, ra'ayi, ko neman haɗin gwiwa, kada ku yi jinkirin tuntuɓar mu.
aboutWhyUs: Me yasa za a zabi myareaspeed?
aboutWhyUsSubtitle: Mu fiye da gwajin sauri kawai. Mu dandamali ne da al'umma ke tafiyar da shi don gaskiyar intanet.
aboutFeature1Text: Muna amfani da bayanan da ba a san sunansu ba, da aka tattara daga jama'a don samar da ainihin aikin intanet.
aboutFeature2Text: Wuce gwajin sauri na gama gari. Fahimci ingancin intanet na musamman a unguwarku.
aboutFeature3Text: Kayan aikinmu kyauta ne don amfani, kuma mun himmatu wajen bayyana yadda muke amfani da bayanai don taimakawa al'umma.
privacyPrinciplesSubtitle: Amincewarku ita ce babban fifikonmu. An gina aikinmu akan waɗannan muhimman ka'idoji.
privacyPrinciple1Text: Ba a taɓa haɗa ainihin ku da sakamakon gwajin ku ko ra'ayoyin da aka raba tare da al'umma ba.
privacyPrinciple2Text: Ana amfani da bayanai ne kawai a jimlace don amfanin al'umma da inganta gaskiya a masana'antar sadarwa.
privacyPrinciple3Text: Ba za mu taɓa sayar da bayananka na sirri ga masu tallace-tallace na waje ko dillalan bayanai ba.
contactGeneralText: Don tambayoyi na gabaɗaya, ra'ayoyi, ko tallafi, don Allah kada ku yi jinkirin tuntuɓar mu.
contactPartnershipsText: Kuna sha'awar haɗin gwiwa ko haɗa bayananmu? Za mu so mu ji daga gare ku.
contactPressText: Don duk tambayoyin kafofin watsa labarai, don Allah a tuntuɓi ƙungiyar sadarwarmu.
tooltip_speed: Yana auna yadda sauri zaka iya sauke bayanai. Mafi girma ya fi kyau don kallo, sauke manyan fayiloli, da bincike.
tooltip_ping: Ana kuma kiransa latency, wannan yana auna tsawon lokacin da sigina ke ɗauka don zuwa uwar garken da dawowa. Mafi ƙanƙanta ya fi kyau don wasannin kan layi da sadarwa ta ainihi.
tooltip_jitter: Yana auna bambancin lokacin ping ɗinka. Ƙananan jitter yana nufin haɗi mai kwanciyar hankali da daidaito, mai mahimmanci ga kiran bidiyo da wasanni.
whatYouCanDoTitle: Abin da saurinka zai iya ɗauka
confirmTestAgainMessage: Ka tabbata kana so ka fara sabon gwaji? Sakamakonka na yanzu zai ɓace.
shareExperienceSubtitle: Raba ra'ayinka ba tare da suna ba don taimakawa wasu su fahimci ingancin intanet a yankinka.
commentPlaceholder: Misali, Yana da kyau don kallo, amma yana yankewa a lokutan aiki...
feedbackSubmittedText: An aika ra'ayinka kuma zai taimaki al'umma.
spamCommentError: Sharhinka ya ƙunshi saƙonnin banza ko hanyoyin haɗi. Don Allah cire su kuma sake gwadawa.
rateLimitError: Kuna aika ra'ayi da sauri. Don Allah jira 'yan mintoci kaɗan.
communitySearchSubtitle: Duba abin da mutane ke faɗi game da aikin intanet a wurare daban-daban.
searchPlaceholder: Bincika ta birni, yanki, ko ISP...
noFeedbackSubtitle: Babu ra'ayi game da wannan yanki tukuna. Kasance na farko da zai raba kwarewarka bayan gwajin sauri!
areaInsightsSubtitle: Kuna son sanin saurin intanet a wani yanki na musamman? Duba ra'ayoyin masu amfani na gaskiya.
jitterExplainedWhatText: Jitter yana auna rashin daidaituwar lokacin ping naka. Yayin da ƙaramin ping yana da kyau, babban jitter yana nufin haɗinka ba shi da kwanciyar hankali, yana haifar da jinkiri maras tabbas. Shine bambancin latency akan lokaci.
jitterExplainedWhyText: Babban jitter shine babban dalilin jinkiri a wasannin kan layi, sauti mai yankewa a kiran bidiyo (kamar Zoom), da buffering yayin kallo. Don aikace-aikacen ainihin lokaci, haɗin gwiwa mai kwanciyar hankali (ƙaramin jitter) galibi ya fi mahimmanci fiye da saurin gaske.
seeOthersSayingTitle: Gani abin da wasu ke fada
seeOthersSayingSubtitle: Binciko ainihin aikin intanet a yankinku kuma ku taimaki wasu ta hanyar raba kwarewarku.
